extracted-table.table-caption: General information about the distribution of the links of the study networks.

caption.p: General information about the distribution of the links of the study networks.

td.bold: The average strength of the links

table-wrap-foot.p: The top table shows the average strength of the links, which are grouped into long or short links and inter-module or intra-module links. The significance of the pairwise differences is assessed using the t-test and is shown in the bottom table.

extracted-table.table-caption: Demographic and clinical information of the studied groups is shown in the top table.

caption.p: Demographic and clinical information of the studied groups is shown in the top table.

table-wrap-foot.p: The pairwise t-test comparisons of the clinical information are presented in the bottom table.
